Description:
Our modern clinic in Doha is looking for experienced Aesthetic Dermatologist to work in our new clinic in Lusail Marina.Requirements:valid licence from Qatar MOPH
proficient in beauty injections (botox, fillers)
you love your work and ready for constant learning and improvement
positive and professional
excellent communication skills
able to build a trust
available to start asap.WHAT WE OFFER:clinic located in tower in Lusail Marina (with gym, pool and restaurant)
competitive salary (fixed + commission)
friendly and supportive environment in the team
you will be working on latest technology equipment by Asclepion, Germany (exclusively in our clinic)
training in Germany on the expense of the company
opportunity for professional and financial growth.Looking forward to welcome you in our team!Skills
Skills:
modern anti-ageing treatments
skin resurfacing
filler/botox
microneedling RF
excellent communication skills
ability to built the trust
